definition: the quality of being worthy of esteem or respect
details:
noun
- the quality of being worthy of esteem or respect
= example: the quality of being worthy of esteem or respect
= synonyms: self-respect, self-regard, self-worth
- formality in bearing and appearance
= example: formality in bearing and appearance
= synonyms: lordliness, gravitas
- high office or rank or station
= example: high office or rank or station
